title: King Bedroom

seo_title: King Bedrooms in NYC - Luxury Rooms & Suites NYC - WestHouse Hotel
seo_description: A calm oasis in the middle of a vibrant city, WestHouse King bedrooms employ a modern and tailored design that incorporates rich wood, textured marbles, and bold graphics. These accommodations are approximately 275 square feet and provide the tranquility of courtyard views.
